events.message: I have filed a claim after my car was involved in a collision at the intersection last evening.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident due to the vehicle collision described.
An agent has been assigned to handle the assessment and processing of your auto accident claim.
We have officially acknowledged receipt of your auto accident claim and are beginning the review process.
Please provide all relevant documents including the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
You have submitted all requested documents promptly, which will help expedite the investigation.
Our claims team has started the formal investigation into the circumstances of your auto accident.
The investigation into your vehicle collision has been completed, and the findings are being reviewed.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damage assessment and policy coverage limits.
We received your feedback expressing satisfaction with the clarity and fairness of the proposed settlement.
Your auto accident claim has been approved and authorized for payment based on the agreed settlement.
The payment corresponding to the settlement amount has been issued and will reach your account shortly.
The auto accident claim has been formally closed following successful settlement and payment delivery.
All records related to your auto accident claim have been archived securely for future reference.
